Olivia Choong Way Sun (amụrụ ya na 13 Febụwarị 1979) bụ onye na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi si Singapore

O guzobere Green Drinks Singapore na Nọvemba 2007, otu na-enweghị uru nke na-eme ka a mara banyere nsogbu gburugburu ebe obibi dị mkpa, ma jikọta azụmaahịa, agụmakwụkwọ, gọọmentị, mgbasa ozi, Òtù ndị na-abụghị gọọmentị na ndị mmadụ n'otu n'otu maka ịkekọrịta ihe ọmụma na ohere mmekorita. O tọrọ ntọala ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta ọha na eze Green PR na Eprel 2010, na-elekwasị anya na obere ụlọ ọrụ gburugburu ebe obibi.
N'afọ 2013, ọ natara onyinye EcoFriend maka onyinye gburugburu ebe obibi ya na Singapore.
Tupu Green Drinks, Olivia nọ n'ọfịs Hill & Knowlton (nke bụzi Hill + Knowlton Strategies - ụlọ ọrụ ndụmọdụ mmekọrịta ọha na eze zuru ụwa ọnụ) na Singapore
Ọfịs ya gụnyere nkwukọrịta ego, PR ndị ahịa na nkwukọrịta ụlọ ọrụ

N'afọ ndị na-adịbeghị anya, Olivia enwewokwa mmasị dị ukwuu n'ịkọ ugbo n'obodo mepere emepe na ọrụ ugbo nwere ntụrụndụ, wee malite The Tender Gardener idepụta njem ndụ ya na-adigide, ma ugbu a kuzie nkuzi metụtara ịkọ ugbo.
Na mgbakwunye, Olivia na-enye akụkọ na Eco-Business.com, InTheLoop, LOHASIA, Public House na Green Kampong
Ọ na-ejekwa ozi na bọọdụ nke Avelife, otu ndị ntorobịa na-abụghị nke gọọmentị na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi.
